segments.text: Thanks . I was hoping that you would all enjoy this meal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you learn to cook these amazing dishes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got a really wonderful cookbook for my birthday and decided to try out a few of the recipes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The chicken is out of this world !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love that dish as well . It is coconut chicken with rice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was wondering if there was shrimp in the soup .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that soup has a shrimp base . I also added sea vegetables and lemon grass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It worked out well that the wine that I brought to share seems to blend well with this meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love this wine ! It goes very well with the chicken .
segments.speaker: S2
